name: Magic Minglers
description:
Magic Minglers is a Turn-based tactical rogue-lite based on elemental spell combination. Room after room, gain simple spells and mix them together to create powerful ones. This prototype shows the overall structure and spell combination. the rogue-lite and the tactical parts are still to be added.

Controls: 

To move: Click on the tile you want to go to

To move after casting a spell: Click on the 4-direction cross to go back to the movement selection

To cast a spell: Click on the spell then on the target/tile

To rotate spell: press R

Tips :

Take cover behind walls to protect yourself, the higher the wall better is the cover.
